name: dashingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is attractive, confident, and exciting: Her boyfriend Alex is 21 years old and dashingly handsome. Overture No. 3 was skilfully conducted and dashingly performed by the Berlin Symphony Orchestra. See
dashing
More examplesFewer examplesThey are auctioning off the shirts he wore so dashingly in the film.The hotel's comfortable bedrooms are dashingly done up but still feel like a country home. He posed for pictures at his West Sussex home, dashingly dressed in tight jeans and a silk shirt.
